SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset
Interface XLinkDeclaration

public interface XLinkDeclaration

Interface that provides link declaration information.
Link declaration information is obtained from an XLink data set.

Field Summary
static short ARC_TYPE_EXTENDED
          Constant that indicates extended type element link declaration information.
static short ARC_TYPE_NONE
          Constant that indicates link declaration information for elements whose type is undefined.
static short ARC_TYPE_SIMPLE
          Constant that indicates simple type element link declaration information.
 
Method Summary
 ArcHashtable getArcs()
          An arc information list table is obtained.
 Node getDefinition()
          A node with link declaration information defined is obtained.
 java.lang.String getEntityURI()
          The URI of an XML document with a link defined is obtained.
 LocatorList getLocators()
          A locator information list is obtained.
 java.lang.String getRole()
          The role attribute value is obtained.
 java.lang.String getTitle()
          The title attribute value is obtained.
 TitleList getTitleList()
          Title information is obtained.
 short getType()
          The link declaration information element type is obtained.
 XLinkDataSet getXLinkDataSet()
          The parent XLink data set is obtained.
 

Field Detail

ARC_TYPE_NONE

public static final short ARC_TYPE_NONE
Constant that indicates link declaration information for elements whose type is undefined.

ARC_TYPE_SIMPLE

public static final short ARC_TYPE_SIMPLE
Constant that indicates simple type element link declaration information.

ARC_TYPE_EXTENDED

public static final short ARC_TYPE_EXTENDED
Constant that indicates extended type element link declaration information.
Method Detail

getXLinkDataSet

public XLinkDataSet getXLinkDataSet()
The parent XLink data set is obtained.
Returns:
The XLink data set holding link declaration information is returned.

getDefinition

public Node getDefinition()
A node with link declaration information defined is obtained.
An extended type element or simple type element is returned as the node with link declaration information defined.
Returns:
The node with link declaration information defined is returned.

getType

public short getType()
The link declaration information element type is obtained.
A constant indicating the link declaration information element type is returned.
One of the following constant values is returned:
  • XLinkDeclaration.ARC_TYPE_SIMPLE
  • XLinkDeclaration.ARC_TYPE_EXTENDED
Returns:
The constant that indicates the link declaration information element type is returned.

getRole

public java.lang.String getRole()
The role attribute value is obtained.
Returns:
The role attribute value is returned.
If no role attribute is defined, a empty string is returned.

getTitle

public java.lang.String getTitle()
The title attribute value is obtained.
Returns:
The title attribute value is returned.
If no title attribute is defined, a empty string is returned.

getTitleList

public TitleList getTitleList()
Title information is obtained.
A title information list held in the link declaration information is returned.
The title information held in the title information list is information about title type elements that are child elements of extended type elements.
If the element type of link declaration information is XLinkDeclaration.ARC_TYPE_SIMPLE, a empty list is always returned.
Returns:
The title information list is returned.
If corresponding title information is not present, a empty list is returned.

getArcs

public ArcHashtable getArcs()
An arc information list table is obtained.
The arc information list table holding arc information under link declaration information is returned.
Returns:
The arc information list table is returned.

getLocators

public LocatorList getLocators()
A locator information list is obtained.
The locator information list holding locator information under link declaration information is returned.
Returns:
The locator information list is returned.

getEntityURI

public java.lang.String getEntityURI()
The URI of an XML document with a link defined is obtained.
Returns:
The URI character string of the XML document is returned.
If the URI cannot be obtained, a empty string is returned.
